job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're seeking a QA Manual Engineer to join our innovative Grip team! As a vital part of our growing team, you'll focus on managing and monitoring defects, ensuring timely resolutions, and collaborating closely with our development teams to deliver top-quality results. At Grip, you'll move beyond traditional QA roles and work with cutting-edge technology and 3D content automation that brings creativity to life., * Thoroughly understand project specifications, designs, and requirements to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
     * Create, maintain, and support detailed test documentation including test plans, suites, cases, checklists, and test data.
     * Conduct detailed manual functional and non-functional testing to identify potential issues.
     * Efficiently manage and monitor defects, ensuring timely resolutions and maintaining communication with development teams.
     * Proactively identify opportunities for process improvements in the testing lifecycle and implement effective solutions.
     * Work closely with development, design, and product management teams in an Agile manner to ensure software functionality aligns with user requirements and is delivered within project timelines.
job_details.full_text:
QA Manual Engineer

We're seeking a QA Manual Engineer to join our innovative Grip team! As a vital part of our growing team, you'll focus on managing and monitoring defects, ensuring timely resolutions, and collaborating closely with our development teams to deliver top-quality results. At Grip, you'll move beyond traditional QA roles and work with cutting-edge technology and 3D content automation that brings creativity to life., * Thoroughly understand project specifications, designs, and requirements to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
     * Create, maintain, and support detailed test documentation including test plans, suites, cases, checklists, and test data.
     * Conduct detailed manual functional and non-functional testing to identify potential issues.
     * Efficiently manage and monitor defects, ensuring timely resolutions and maintaining communication with development teams.
     * Proactively identify opportunities for process improvements in the testing lifecycle and implement effective solutions.
     * Work closely with development, design, and product management teams in an Agile manner to ensure software functionality aligns with user requirements and is delivered within project timelines.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on manual QA engineering, defect management, and traditional testing processes. It lacks any mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technical tasks and technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer profiles.

phrases.phrase: Thoroughly understand project specifications, designs, and requirements to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
phrases.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding project requirements and specifications, which is a key aspect of business understanding in a technical context.

phrases.phrase: Work closely with development, design, and product management teams in an Agile manner to ensure software functionality aligns with user requirements and is delivered within project timelines.
phrases.justification: This highlights collaboration with various teams to ensure alignment with user requirements and project timelines, demonstrating an understanding of business goals and product delivery.

phrases.phrase: collaborating closely with our development teams to deliver top-quality results.
phrases.justification: While not directly developing software, close collaboration with development teams implies involvement in the software delivery lifecycle and understanding of development processes.

phrases.phrase: collaborating closely with our development teams

managing and monitoring defects, ensuring timely resolutions
Conduct detailed manual functional and non-functional testing to identify potential issues.
Proactively identify opportunities for process improvements in the testing lifecycle and implement effective solutions.
